definitions.definition: A substance added to another substance or product to produce specific properties in the combined substance.
examples: Oil may be used as an additive in gasoline to improve the lubrication of a small engine.

definitions.definition: A word or phrase that adds something, such as also , even , or nor .

main_definition: A substance added to another substance or product to produce specific properties in the combined substance.
secondary_definitions: ( grammar ) A word or phrase that adds something, such as also , even , or nor .
